body.p: Which of the following is the first step in sending a large JPEG file over a network?

multiple_choice.choice: Two copies of the file are sent in case part does not come through.
The file is divided into relatively small packets, which can be sent independently.
The file is divided into two pieces, which can be sent independently.
The file is first translated into the byte scheme of the recipient.
The file is divided into pixels, which can be sent independently.

response.feedback: Typically, just one copy is sent.
A large file is divided into packets for sending.
Dividing a large file into pieces is correct, but it is not just two pieces.
Typically, the bytes of the file are sent as they are.
Dividing a large file is correct, but it is not into pixels.
